casebody.data:
Christopher DICESARE, James Little, and Johanna MacArthur, individually and on behalf of all others similarly situated
v.
The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG HOSPITAL AUTHORITY, d/b/a/ Carolinas Healthcare System No. 156P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Russ Ferguson, III, Attorney at Law, James P. Cooney, III, Attorney at Law, Mark J. Horoschak, Attorney at Law, Brian Allen Hayles, Attorney at Law, Sarah Motley Stone, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authority, d/b/a Carolinas Healthcare System. Reynolds Michael Elliot, Attorney at Law, for DiCesare, Christopher, et al. Linwood Jones, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Hospital Association.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 19th of May 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Business Court, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Business Court:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
